import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import {Link, useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import {Row, Col, Image, ListGroup, Card, Button} from 'react-bootstrap' import Rating from '../components/Rating' import foods from '../foods' const FoodScreen = () => { const params = useParams() const food = foods.find(p => p._id === params.id) return ( <> Go Back

{food.name}

 Price: ${food.price} Description: {food.description} Price: ${food.price} ) } export default FoodScreen
